Armor_Material.Name: Adamantine
Armor_Material.Description: An ultrahard metal found in meteorites and extraordinary mineral veins.

Armor_Material.Name: Alchemical Silver
Armor_Material.Description: A complex process involving metallurgy and alchemy can bond silver to a weapon made of steel.

Armor_Material.Name: Bone
Armor_Material.Description: A part of the skeletal system of some creature.

Armor_Material.Name: Bronze
Armor_Material.Description: A yellowish-brown alloy of copper with up to one-third tin.

Armor_Material.Name: Cold Iron
Armor_Material.Description: A rare form of iron left over from the creation of the Parallel Planes (Material Plane, Feywild, and Shadowfell) from the Elemental Chaos.

Armor_Material.Name: Darkwood
Armor_Material.Description: A rare magic wood that is as hard as normal wood but very light.

Armor_Material.Name: Dragonhide
Armor_Material.Description: A dragon skin that has been treated for human use.

Armor_Material.Name: Iron
Armor_Material.Description: A strong, hard magnetic silvery-gray metal.

Armor_Material.Name: Mithral
Armor_Material.Description: A very rare silvery, glistening metal that is lighter than iron but just as hard.

Armor_Material.Name: Rustic Wood
Armor_Material.Description: An untreated, fresh wood found and used in its natural state.

Armor_Material.Name: Steel
Armor_Material.Description: A hard, strong, gray or bluish-gray alloy of iron with carbon and usually other elements.

Armor_Material.Name: Stone
Armor_Material.Description: A hard, solid, nonmetallic mineral matter.
